department.en: PhD in Institute of Translational and Interdisciplinary Medicine
department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系跨領域轉譯醫學博士班

goal.en: Introduction to deep learning for applying to real world projects
goal.ch: 了解深度學習概念及應用到實際專題案例

content.en: "1. An intuitive understanding of deep learning and the essential concepts,2. Hands-on work in solving problems using matlab, python, pytorch, keras, and tensorflow,3. Experience building models for typical domains of deep learning: understanding images, videos, and text,4. Completed a selection of projects"
content.ch: "1. An intuitive understanding of deep learning and the essential concepts,2. Hands-on work in solving problems using matlab, python, pytorch, keras, and tensorflow,3. Experience building models for typical domains of deep learning: understanding images, videos, and text,4. Completed a selection of projects"

textbook.en: "References: Hands-on Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras & Tensorflow, 2nd Edition, Aurelien Geron"
textbook.ch: "參考書: Hands-on Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras & Tensorflow, 2nd Edition, Aurelien Geron"

method.en: Lecture Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.en: homework 30%, midterm presentation 30%, final presentation 30%, Attendance 10%
grading.ch: 程式作業30%, 期中報告30%, 期末報告 30%, 出席率 10%

en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance ， Products/Creative Performance

Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

en: Department:Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、PhD in Institute of Translational and Interdisciplinary Medicine、Ph.D. Program of Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、Ph.D. Program of Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.

ch: 系所:限生醫科學與工程學系、生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班、生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班、生醫科學與工程學系跨領域轉譯醫學博士班、生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊博士班、生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程博士班。
